attributes.action: Stop the endless expenses given to MPs as the present payments policy allows, and Give the Members of Parliament a higher basic wage but with no lavish expense accounts which obviously in todays climate are open to abuse. Never forget it is under the Representation of the Peoples act that you Govern in OUR name
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The present Salaries and other Payments to MPs are not Transparent and accountable to the general public at large.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
